id.comment: Set 1 - Test syntax of UsesP. UsesP syntax, LHS synonym RHS synonym

query.querystr: procedure pr; variable v; Select v such that Uses(pr, v)

id.comment: UsesP syntax, LHS invalid synonym RHS synonym

query.querystr: constant c; variable v; Select v such that Uses(c, v)

id.comment: UsesP syntax, LHS synonym RHS invalid synonym

query.querystr: procedure pr; stmt s; Select pr such that Uses(pr, s)

id.comment: UsesP syntax, LHS invalid synonym RHS invalid synonym

query.querystr: variable v; prog_line n; Select v such that Uses(v, n)

id.comment: UsesP syntax, LHS synonym RHS wildcard

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Uses(pr, _)

id.comment: UsesP syntax, LHS wildcard RHS synonym

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Uses(_, v)

id.comment: UsesP syntax, LHS wildcard RHS wildcard

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Uses(_, _)

id.comment: UsesP syntax, LHS synonym RHS Ident

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Uses(pr, "i")

id.comment: UsesP syntax, LHS synonym RHS invalid Ident

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Uses(pr, "3g")

id.comment: UsesP syntax, LHS Ident RHS synonym

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Uses("I", v)

id.comment: UsesP syntax, LHS invalid Ident RHS synonym

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Uses("d3ad", v)

id.comment: UsesP syntax, LHS Ident RHS Ident

id.comment: UsesP syntax, LHS Ident RHS invalid Ident

query.querystr: print pn; Select pn such that Uses("C", "wrong")

id.comment: UsesP syntax, LHS invalid Ident RHS invalid Ident

query.querystr: read r; Select r such that Uses("Q", "nonexist")

id.comment: Set 2 - Relation tests for UsesP. Relation, Procedure that does not exist
